Linkbasher saves you time by resolving shortened links without opening your browser.
bit.ly, goo.gl, ow.ly, t.co, tinyurl.com, wp.me

The next time you tap on a shortened link and are prompted with a list of apps, choose \"Linkbasher\" then hit \"Always\". Linkbasher will do the rest! If for any reason Linkbasher can\'t open the link, you\'ll be prompted again to choose a different app (such as your browser)
